channel.title: EasyRSC v1.1 xp rate question
channel.description:
I saw my default that EasyRSC is at 5.0x. I changed this to 1.0x and it is actually giving 30x in game. i.e. I catch a shrimp that is supposed to give 10 xp and it gives 300. I've rigged it to be somewhat accurate my setting the xp rate at .0334. Is there a better way for me to resolve this issue?
Thanks!

item.title: EasyRSC v1.1 xp rate question
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

the issue is the Def files, they should hold the normal rates of stuff, but i believe in those versions they were dodgy and had like 20x the exp rates in them. id replace all the defs with something out of another source thats accurate.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC v1.1 xp rate question
item.dc:creator: @MindTwist MindTwist
item.description:
@MindTwist wrote:

You need to change the actual exp rate per skill if you want it to be the same as RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC v1.1 xp rate question
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

imthenull:

the experience for the skill may be wrong? Have you checked that?

It is not an issue with the exp for the skill. I have just checked a few other skills.

If anyone has any other suggestions, please let me know.

EDIT: The other skill I tested was woodcutting and the xp rate was set to 1, but I gained levels with first log cut. I just tried combat (killed a lvl 3 gnome) and it gave me 9 strength xp. I think that is more on par… So that makes this even more confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC v1.1 xp rate question
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

I remember have this same problem think it was with the Beyond rsc source, once I am home I will see if I can find it to help you out more.

Read full topic
